short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find precise English-to-English definitions effortlessly and for free with this intuitive dictionary extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discover the world of words with this FREE, open-source Merriam-Webster Dictionary extension, without switching tabs or getting distracted.

Uncover English-to-English definitions swiftly and effortlessly. Its simple search box ensures you access definitions seamlessly without losing focus on your content.

‚ö†Ô∏è Note: This is a powerful dictionary tool for defining words and phrases, NOT a translator.

‚ö†Ô∏è Note: While this extension is free, users need to sign up for a dictionaryapi.com account to generate their own API key for unlimited access. (More details in extension settings.)

‚ú©‚ú© Key Features ‚ú©‚ú©

1Ô∏è‚É£ Effortless Definition Retrieval:
- Quickly get results within a user-friendly search box, whether by typing or selecting.
- Capture highlighted text from your browser effortlessly ‚Äì select a text, open the box, and get instant results.
- Enhance efficiency with a convenient bubble button; a single button click near the selected text will show the definitions

2Ô∏è‚É£ Access to the main definitions page
- Direct link in results for main definitions page
- Selected text context menu item to open the main definition page
- Configure the bubble button to open the main definition page

3Ô∏è‚É£ Search History Tracking:
- Quickly revisit past searches via the extension's history page.
- Retrieve previously searched words on a webpage using the convenient review toolbar at the bottom left.

4Ô∏è‚É£ Video-Friendly Features:
- Pause playing video and resume automatically during searches for uninterrupted focus and time efficiency.

5Ô∏è‚É£ Compatibility with all OpenDictionary APIs:
- All the dictionary APIs offered by OpenDictionary for a comprehensive dictionary experience.

---- 
ü§î Do I need it?
This extension is perfect for individuals who:
- Frequently Seek English-to-English Definitions
- Tired of Information Overload
Value Simplicity and Efficiency and Desire Effortless Exploration


‚ÑπÔ∏è FAQ:
‚ùì Is it free to use? 
- Yes! The extension utilizes Merriam-Webster's free services.

‚ùì Any limitations on API key usage? 
- The default key offers 20 definitions to allow all users to try out the service, but you can easily get your FREE personal API key with instructions on the options page.

‚ùì Can I use it to translate to other languages?
- This extension is for defining words and phrases in English. However, you can get a free Spanish-English API key to see the definitions of Spanish words in Spanish.

‚ùì Can I use this extension to translate sentences?
- No, this extension can only provide word-to-word or phrase definitions and thesaurus entries.

‚ùì Can I customize the extension? 
- Yes, explore various options to tailor your experience in the options menu.

----
Lastly, this extension is hastily developed for personal use so don't be shy to give any constructive feedback to improve it.
